old: 白竜様のご加護があらんことを
column2: May the blessings of The White Dragon, Lady Arisen, be with you.

old: リムの輝きは常に貴方と共に
column2: The radiance of Rift Crystal is always with you.

old:
メンバーの再編でしたら
私にお申し付けください
column2: If you are reorganizing your membership, please contact me at

old: 旅の同伴者をお求めでしょうか、覚者殿
column2: Are you looking for a traveling companion, Master Sensei?
